info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 5:44PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Washington and south central Iron Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 544 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles northwest of New Harmony, or 20 miles west of Cedar City, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pinto and Newcastle. This includes the following highways... Utah Route 18 near mile marker 36. Utah Route 56 between mile markers 32 and 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
